name: Technolites: Episode 1
description: Technolites is an action packed top down shooter with an epic animated adventure, fully voice acted. The first game in the genre to allow you to build your own ship, with dozens of unique parts and weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: dual core 3ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb GPU Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: quad core 2ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 1030 2gb Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: integrated
